features: LIGHT SCENT: Made with no heavy perfumes, no dyes, and no phosphates
ALL-DAY, LONG-LASTING FRESHNESS: Downy Light Laundry Scent Booster Beads add 4x longer-lasting freshness to your laundry than with the leading detergent alone
EASY TO USE: To start, simply toss half a cap of laundry beads into the washer drum before your clothing; next time, adjust the amount of beads to your desired level of freshness
SAFE FOR ALL LOADS: Can be used on all colors and fabrics, and is safe enough to use in all washing machines
OCEAN MIST: Experience the light scent of fresh air paired with a cool and crisp ocean breeze
body.description: Finally, long-lasting scent that is not overpowering. Downy Light Laundry Scent Booster Beads are small, lightly scented laundry beads that give you all-day Downy freshness. They’re made with no heavy perfumes, dyes, or phosphates… Plus, the Ocean Mist scent has the lightweight scent of fresh air and a crisp ocean breeze for a true escape-worthy freshness for everyone. With detergent alone, the freshness of your clothes can fade after taking them out of the wash. Using Downy laundry booster beads gives your laundry 4x the long-lasting freshness than with the leading detergent alone, so you can be confident in fresh-smelling clothes all day long. They can be used on all colors and fabrics and are safe to use in all washing machines. These laundry scent beads are easy to use; just start by tossing them right into the washer drum before adding your clothing. Use as much or as little as you want to get your desired level of freshness. Looking for more ways to keep your clothes fresh? Add Downy fabric softener and dryer laundry sheets to your routine for added softness.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us The agitation, spinning, and heat of the laundry process can damage clothes at the fiber level. But Downy Fabric Softener smooths and strengthens fibers to protect clothes from the damage of the wash, helping them maintain their shape. By smoothing fibers, Downy reduces the friction between them that causes them to break and leads to pills and fuzz. And when fibers break, colors appear duller, so using Downy also helps keep your clothes from fading.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing smell and great for dog owners with stinky dog beds
reviews.reviewText: Downy Light Laundry Scent Booster Beads in Ocean Mist are a game-changer when it comes to infusing a lasting, refreshing aroma into laundry. The enchanting scent not only captivates the senses during the wash but lingers for weeks, even on notoriously stubborn items like my German Shepherd's beds and blankets.The standout feature of these scent booster beads is undeniably the amazing fragrance. The Ocean Mist scent is a breath of fresh air, creating a delightful and calming atmosphere in every load. The beads dissolve seamlessly in the wash, infusing clothes, linens, and even pet bedding with an irresistible freshness that lasts well beyond the laundry day.For pet owners, especially those with larger breeds like German Shepherds, the challenge of eliminating persistent odors is familiar. Downy Light's Scent Booster Beads rise to the occasion, leaving even the stinkiest items smelling as if they've been kissed by a gentle ocean breeze. The longevity of the scent is impressive, contributing to a consistently pleasant environment for both pets and their owners.The packaging is practical and user-friendly, allowing for easy dispensing of the beads directly into the washing machine. The 26.5 oz size provides ample product for numerous laundry loads, ensuring an enduring supply of freshness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Downy scented beads have transformed my laundry routine! The captivating fragrance lingers long after washing, making my clothes smell heavenly. The beads dissolve seamlessly, leaving fabrics soft and fresh. A game-changer for anyone seeking a burst of long-lasting fragrance in their laundry. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have used scent boosters for probably 7-8 years now, but only reviewing for the first time…mainly because I’ve religiously & adamantly used only natural laundry & cleaning products since my 6 months old daughter was diagnosed w eczema & quickly discovered harsh chemicals made a HUGE difference, but as our washing machine got older, things didn’t always smell fresh, even after super hot water wash. So, w her in her teens & able to instantly identify new irritants, thought I’d try some, & could leave off her items if necessary. If any other parents may be curious out of similar concerns….I’ve now tried just about every brand of scented laundry additive made, & was a long time gain moonlight breeze fan….LOVED the scent…sweet w/o being too much, perfumy, or inappropriate for my husband & teenage son, but ultimately found myself using way more than recommended in order for the scent to last. At some point, when my preferred gain was out in the store, I settled for Downy shimmer….which INSTANTLY became our favorite replacement. The scent lasted much longer & was a nicer pleasant gender neutral scent. Going through several periods of Shimmer being unavailable~w other’s questioning if it was discontinued online, I settled on Spring…it’s quite similar but a little sweeter? Honestly, they’re the only 2 scents I’d found I would even consider!! I came across a small bottle of the Shea Blossom in a store I normally don’t shop for that sort of thing, but it & another were new to me, so thought I’d just take a whiff out of curiosity….I’m the one smelling every candle on the aisle in Marshall’s & Tj Maxx because ya NEVER KNOW what gem you may find amongst 95%, or more, scents I wouldn’t burn if given to me free~I’m obviously quite picky about fragrances & don’t usually like anything ‘created,’ like fresh, rain, etc, but also don’t care for fabulous scents that disappear instantly either. Shea Blossom was an incredibly unexpected surprise!!! I wouldn’t say as strong or on the sweet side as Shimmer or Spring, I guess more floral, but an incredibly mild floral….almost a weak Gardenia. I mean, it is called “light,” but I wouldn’t know if the bottle didn’t say so because the performance isn’t a bit lighter! To me, it’s just a more natural, earthy scent….idk the right words exactly except, not as forced. Clothes smell exactly as you’d expect coming out of the wash, & occasionally I use a little extra on items that won’t be used soon. **an important note…using a front loader, I often add a bit of vinegar to the softener compartment because it helps loosen dirt, strip odors & softens, while also helping the drum stay cleaner, but it doesn’t affect the scent whatsoever! Smells equally great w or w/o vinegar** Fortunately, the Gain boosters didn’t irritate her skin when using a little less than recommended, & the Downy boosters have not irritated her at all, yet Downy fabric softener has caused mild irritation while Tide sets her skin on fire!!!! Knowing it’s definitely more chemicals than I’ll allow at any other time, I feel reassured it’s not bad enough to require caution, & I get to treat myself to a rare bonus of not worrying when I pull out long stored linens for guests that they may need a fresh wash first (I have actually added small plastic pouches w some beads & w holes punched throughout also in items stored in fabric bins long term to help due to a musty smell infiltrating the closet from the crawl space beneath) I have now solely converted to Shea Blossom permanently & even subscribed to monthly delivery. And, now that my daughter is grown & added her 2nd child recently, she has quite rolling her eyes at my use of natural products & converted herself, though she too has chosen to make an exception for Downy Scent Boosters, though opting for a different scent (I think the Light Ocean Mist), & using 1/2 the recommended amount, which she says is perfect as quickly as items are used/worn & therefore washed often. But she readily substitutes mine when she’s out! Doesn’t use on her 5 months old baby, but has been using for her 5 years old son since 1 or so when she also switched from the Gain brand. Newly tried natural detergents have come & gone due to reactions, but Downy has proven trustworthy & continued to be consistently gentle & non irritating to her highly sensitive skin, as well as her young children’s (the baby sleeps on her sheets, & mine, & has extremely close contact w our clothes. Of course EVERYONE is different, but I would recommend at least trying if you have skin concerns because our experience has been great, & that’s rarely true outside green products! And, if you’re not a big fan of overwhelming or intensely permeating smells, I’d also recommend Shea Blossom, & hopefully you too can finally enjoy a mild fragrance boost that’s typically next to impossible to find

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great scent good product
reviews.reviewText: I found this scent during Amazon days absolutely love it. Got a great deal on it too. It is a nice clean scent not to heavy, just right, not overwhelming at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All Time Fav Scent
reviews.reviewText: This is the best scent ever! I get asked all the time what we use in our laundry to make it smell so good and I swear this is my secret weapon. I have gone nose blind to it but as long as others are asking I know it must be working. The one thing I will say is that if I wash blanket and sheets in it the smell doesn’t cling on for as long as I would like. If they sit in the shelf I also notice it doesn’t cling as much. I use this more on my everyday clothes I wear often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New laundry favorite!
reviews.reviewText: I'm big on great smelling clothes. I want them to look and smell clean, but not to have that typical laundry smell. This is my new favorite! The scent is light enough not to be overpowering, but strong enough that it lasts! Use extra on your blankets... you'll love it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smell great but not lightly scented
reviews.reviewText: I was using the Downey Unstoppables before I bought these and I think those were a lot lighter scented. I just less of these and they smell a lot stronger. But I'm ok with it because they smell fantastic and they make my clothes and bedding smell great for quite awhile! It doesn't feel like they're leaving any noticeable residue on my clothing or washer either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE SMELL IS SO GOOD!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve gotten compliments on how good I smell, when it’s these BEADS!!! I also buy the dryer sheets. We LOVE this smell! It clean and sweet-ish. Not too sweet. We love this scent!
This product has a nice scent not to strong and makes the laundry smell nice and you don't need to add any sheets in the dryer
Je l’aime bien odeur très délicate j’adore:)

reviews.reviewTitle: Un produit qui booste ma lessive quotidienne et apporte une touche parfumée irrésistible !
reviews.reviewText: Je suis ravi d'avoir découvert Downty Lavande Blanche sur Amazon ! Ce produit est devenu mon incontournable pour mes lessives au quotidien.Dès l'ouverture du pot, l'odeur enivrante de la lavande blanche se répand dans ma buanderie, créant une atmosphère apaisante. Les perles sont faciles à utiliser, il suffit d'en ajouter une petite quantité dans le tambour de la machine et de laisser agir leur magie.Grâce à leur formule puissante, mes vêtements sont non seulement parfaitement propres et frais, mais ils dégagent également un parfum divin qui persiste longtemps. Même après plusieurs jours, je peux encore sentir la subtile fragrance de la lavande blanche sur mes vêtements.J'apprécie également le fait que ces perles Dissoudent rapidement et complètement dans l'eau, évitant ainsi tout résidu ou dépôt sur mes vêtements. De plus, elles ne tachent pas mes textiles délicats, ce qui me permet de les utiliser en toute confiance pour mes affaires les plus précieuses.Le bonus non négligeable est que les Perles de Downty Booster à la Lavande Blanche ne sont pas seulement efficaces pour rafraîchir mes vêtements, ils donnent aussi une petite touche agréable a toute ma maison. Je les utilise maintenant dans mon diffuseur d'huiles essentielles, créant ainsi une ambiance détendue et sereine dans mon intérieur.En conclusion, je recommande vivement les Downty Perles Booster Lavande Blanche à tous ceux et celles qui souhaitent ajouter une note parfumée irrésistible à leurs lessives. Ce produit ne déçoit pas et me procure entière satisfaction à chaque utilisation.
Perfect scent to any gender wash load! Best product out there as it’s scent is fragrant and light even safe for children’s laundry.
I’m not much for smells, but I do like this one.
